subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Led by two goals apiece from Phoenix’s Yanic Perreault, Minnesota’s Brian Rolston, Chicago’s Martin Havlat and Columbus’s Rick Nash, the Western Conference cruised to a 12-9 victory over the Eastern Conference.
snippet: Led by two goals apiece from Phoenix’s Yanic Perreault, Minnesota’s Brian Rolston, Chicago’s Martin Havlat and Columbus’s Rick Nash, the Western Conference cruised to a 12-9 victory over the Eastern Conference.
